ComicInfo.Title: Specialized Parties That Fit a Magazine; Cracked's Record Reviews; How to Make an 'X' Movie Out of a Classic Film; Inflation; Rocket Flight; Elvis Talks Salary (Like a Million!); Cracked's Fun and Puzzle Contests; Cracked Visits a Track Meet; When Prime Time Goes Gourmet...; The Fight Against Air & Water Pollution; The Man and the Bird; Cracked Looks at Telephones; The Piggy Bank; Butch Cavity and the Sundrenched Kid
ComicInfo.Summary:
British editions are identical to the US editions except for the price and cover date. The UK numbering includes Cracked Collectors' Editions.Movies including Snow White and the Seven Dwarfs, the Pied Piper, Tom Sawyer, Pinnochio, Noah's Ark and Swiss Family Robinson are altered to become 'X' rated films.
Hudd and Dini build a rocket to escape prison but the guard makes them think he's an alien to scare them back to their cell.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev36 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-04-05 17:42:31. [Issue ID 250448]
ComicInfo.Writer: Bill Ward,Vic Martin,John Severin,Oskar Blotta Jr.
ComicInfo.Penciller: Charlie Rodrigues,John Severin,John Langton,Bob Taylor,Bill Ward,Vic Martin,Oskar Blotta Jr.,Caracu
ComicInfo.Inker: Charlie Rodrigues,John Severin,John Langton,Bob Taylor,Bill Ward,Vic Martin,Oskar Blotta Jr.,Caracu
